opc:Constant.Name: NodeId
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The canonical identifier for the node.

opc:Constant.Name: NodeClass
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The class of the node.

opc:Constant.Name: BrowseName
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A non-localized, human readable name for the node.

opc:Constant.Name: DisplayName
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A localized, human readable name for the node.

opc:Constant.Name: Description
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A localized description for the node.

opc:Constant.Name: WriteMask
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Indicates which attributes are writable.

opc:Constant.Name: UserWriteMask
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Indicates which attributes are writable by the current user.

opc:Constant.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Indicates that a type node may not be instantiated.

opc:Constant.Name: Symmetric
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Indicates that forward and inverse references have the same meaning.

opc:Constant.Name: InverseName
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The browse name for an inverse reference.

opc:Constant.Name: ContainsNoLoops
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Indicates that following forward references within a view will not cause a loop.

opc:Constant.Name: EventNotifier
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Indicates that the node can be used to subscribe to events.

opc:Constant.Name: Value
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value of a variable.

opc:Constant.Name: DataType
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The node id of the data type for the variable value.

opc:Constant.Name: ValueRank
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The number of dimensions in the value.

opc:Constant.Name: ArrayDimensions
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The length for each dimension of an array value.

opc:Constant.Name: AccessLevel
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: How a variable may be accessed.

opc:Constant.Name: UserAccessLevel
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: How a variable may be accessed after taking the user's access rights into account.

opc:Constant.Name: MinimumSamplingInterval
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Specifies (in milliseconds) how fast the server can reasonably sample the value for changes.

opc:Constant.Name: Historizing
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Specifies whether the server is actively collecting historical data for the variable.

opc:Constant.Name: Executable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Whether the method can be called.

opc:Constant.Name: UserExecutable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Whether the method can be called by the current user.

opc:Constant.Name: DataTypeDefinition
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Provides the metadata and encoding information for custom DataTypes.

opc:Constant.Name: RolePermissions
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The permissions for the node granted to roles.

opc:Constant.Name: UserRolePermissions
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The subset of permissions available for the roles available to the current session.

opc:Constant.Name: AccessRestrictions
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The access restrictions assigned to the node.

opc:Constant.Name: AccessLevelEx
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: How a variable may be accessed.
